titles.title: Congratulating the National Air Transportation Association for celebrating its 70th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Mr. Carnahan moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1669.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/1/2010--Passed House amended. Congratulates the National Air Transportation Association for celebrating its 70th anniversary. Applauds the Association for creating programs and resources to enhance the safety of general aviation operators. Commends it for being instrumental in bolstering the general aviation industry during a time of turmoil in the 1940s.
